me.normanmaurer.niosmtp.transport
Interface SMTPClientSession

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractSMTPClientSession, PooledSMTPClientSession
public interface SMTPClientSession

This is the SMTP Session which belongs to a Connection to a SMTP Server. It's created once a connection was successfully established and valid till its closed via close() or an Exception

Author:
Norman Maurer

Nested Class Summary
static interface SMTPClientSession.CloseListener
          Listener which will get notified once the SMTPClientSession was closed

getSupportedExtensions

Set<String> getSupportedExtensions()
Return a "read-only" Set of all supported EXTENSIONS. This will be set in the EHLO Response so you will get an empty Set before the EHLO Response was processed

Returns:
extensions

void send(SMTPRequest request,
          SMTPResponseCallback callback)
Send the given SMTPRequest to the connected SMTP-Server. The given SMTPResponseCallback will get called once the SMTPResponse was received or an Exception was thrown

send

void send(SMTPPipeliningRequest request,
          SMTPMultiResponseCallback callback)
Send the given SMTPPipeliningRequest to the connected SMTP-Server. The given SMTPMultiResponseCallback will get executed for each response till SMTPMultiResponseCallback.isDone(SMTPClientSession) returns false

request -
callback -

InetSocketAddress getRemoteAddress()
Return the remote InetSocketAddress which the SMTPClientSession is bound to. If the SMTPClientSession is not yet bound this may return null

addCloseListener

Add an SMTPClientSession.CloseListener which will get notified once the SMTPClientSession was closed. This may be because the client or the server has closed it
